dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] warezzz report on ur services]
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not

claim.

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: abuseadm@theplanet.com [mailto:abuseadm@theplanet.com] On Behalf
Of Policy Enforcement
Posted At: Tuesday, May 16, 2006 11:25 AM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: [Fwd: [ABUSE] warezzz report on ur services]
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] warezzz report on ur services]


-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

For your review. The materials in question are not online at this time.

Thank you,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] warezzz report on ur services
Date: Tue, 16 May 2006 11:43:43 +0400
From: Denis Podluzhny <snego@inbox.ru>
Reply-To: Denis Podluzhny <snego@inbox.ru>
To: abuse@theplanet.com
CC: abuse@ubi.com, abuse@nival.com

Hello there.

I have to report that one of ur clients use service for sharing of
warez.
For example: latest "Heroes of Might and Magic V".

Look here:
http://files.l2forum.ru/Heroes.Of.Might.And.Magic.V.EMUDVD-Unleashed/ -
those are redirect to one of ur servers:

  7   149 ms   150 ms   150 ms  POS3-1.IG2.NYC4.ALTER.NET
[208.192.179.133]
  8   149 ms   150 ms   150 ms  0.so-2-2-0.XL1.NYC4.ALTER.NET
[152.63.20.58]
  9   230 ms   180 ms   200 ms  0.so-3-0-0.XL1.DFW13.ALTER.NET
[152.63.98.121]
 10   180 ms   180 ms   180 ms  POS6-0.GW1.DFW13.ALTER.NET
[152.63.103.85]
 11   191 ms   190 ms   190 ms  theplanet-gw.customer.alter.net
[157.130.143.226
]
 12   181 ms   184 ms   175 ms  vl31.dsr01.dllstx3.theplanet.com
[70.85.127.29]

 13   182 ms   178 ms   180 ms  vl21.dsr01.dllstx2.theplanet.com
[70.85.127.67]

 14   180 ms   190 ms   190 ms  po1.car19.dllstx2.theplanet.com
[12.96.160.4]
 15   181 ms   190 ms   230 ms  ns1.nszdns.com [69.93.142.196]

I hope u will do some actions about it.

- -- wbr
Denis Podluzhny.
